description.value:
Class Skills: An oracle with the metal mystery adds Appraise, Bluff, Disable Device, and Intimidate to her list of class skills.

Bonus Spells: 

  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.d0rd4z2kcln69xif]{Lead Blades} (2nd), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.3b1x69kfhnsa2d54]{Heat Metal} (4th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.bbrkkjmgo5kof6gn]{Keen Edge} (6th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.vjnynvz1omleni8a]{Versatile Weapon} (8th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.b8lt1275mz4ez4d8]{Major Creation} (metal items only) (10th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.fnxgq54y02f6ri82]{Wall of Iron} (12th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.g52zx1t1giteg5h1]{Statue} (metal statue instead of iron) (14th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.oeemcnfjod9zd7my]{Repel Metal or Stone} (16th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.mkrjbrp57yfdqrx0]{Iron Body} (18th).
